name: Babby of Towlr
description:
This game was created for Mini-LD#5, as a sequel to the game Towlr, made by PoV in only 3 hours. The sequel took about the same amount of time to create.  What is it?  A puzzle.  What kind?  Who knows!?  The puzzle is to figure out what the puzzle is, and then solve it.  Also, it is very hard on your brain and quite disturbing.  Warning: Massive flashing colors could cause seizures if you are prone to that sort of thing!

Enjoy many other Towlr at Towlr.ludumdare.com .
